Head Blacksmith Noel:
This icy air is perfect for pounding the stell! Scorching fire and icy air - that's what makes good, hard stell! Conflict makes everything stronger, that's for sure!
Same with life - no matter how much scrrow or turmoil you may face, if you can endure it, you will become as strong and resilient as tempered steel!
Ah, but what has brought you to me, friend? I'll gladly provide what help I can.
